name: Conquer Taiwan at Christmas 聖誕節來征服台灣吧
name_original: Conquer Taiwan at Christmas 聖誕節來征服台灣吧
description:
✱Taiwan is in the grip of war

Not only Taiwan, but the whole world is in chaos,

And the mastermind behind the scenes is th demons,

conquer Taiwan and defeat those abominable demons...

As for why you need to conquer Taiwan if you want to defeat the demons...?

It's not important at all. 

Strategy games are good as long as they can be played,

the reason for war is too lazy to think about it.

In short, the demons are the bad guys. Let's defeat those bad guys.

The plot of this game is very casual, please don't get too caught up in the plot.

The game includes a total of 16 Taiwan counties：

Changhua：

Recruitment success rate 130%

Chiayi：

Cleric's skill effect is tripled

Hsinchu：

Assassin's skill effect is tripled

Hualien：

Manager's skill effect is tripled

Kaohsiung：

Kill enemies to restore 20% HP

Miaoli：

Character enhancement cost 70%

Nantou：

40% reduction in character loyalty

NewTaipei：

Character AGI increased by 3

Penghu：

Can be bombed every 3 minutes

Pingtung：

Paladin's skill effect is tripled

Taichung：

Damage to characters 120%

Tainan：

Damage to the area 130%

T aitung：

Kill the enemy and get NT$6000

Taoyuan：

Damage from Paladin 60%

Yilan：

Damage to Cleric 180%

Yunlin：

190% damage in the first four days

Choose your favorite county,

and start conquering the whole of Taiwan step by step from the surrounding counties!

How to turn on Self-abuse difficulty：

Clear any county on Hard difficulty once.

How to unlock Desperate difficulty：

Every county has passed the Self-abuse difficulty.
